items.q: Who receives the money that is donated?
items.a: All contributions, whether donated through Open Collective or GitHub, are received by the Open Source Collective, which is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. The Open Source Collective acts as a fiscal host for ESLint and keeps track of all donations.

items.q: Will I get a record of my donations?
items.a: All contributions, whether donated through Open Collective or GitHub, are received by the Open Source Collective, which is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. The Open Source Collective acts as a fiscal host for ESLint and keeps track of all donations.
